alert.note: Alert for Houston; Twiggs (Georgia) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued September 01 at 2:02PM EDT by NWS Atlanta
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of southwestern Twiggs and northeastern Houston Counties through 230 PM EDT... At 201 PM EDT, a strong thunderstorm was near Tarversville, or 9 miles southwest of Jeffersonville, moving southwest at 5 mph. HAZARD...Up to 40 mph wind, frequent cloud to ground lightning and heavy rain. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Expect minor damage to tree limbs and blowing around of light, unsecured objects. Heavy rain may cause temporary street flooding especially in poor drainage areas. Locations impacted include... Warner Robins, Robins AFB, Tarversville, Bonaire, Robins Air Force Base and Bullard. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: People outdoors should seek shelter immediately. If you can hear thunder, you are close enough to be struck by lightning. Motorists should slow down and be prepared for possible loss of control due to hydroplaning.
